text: la yunal hdha alfadl aleazim balamany alty ttmnwnha 'ayuha almslmwn, wala bamany 'ahl alkitab min alyhwd walnsara, wa'iinama yunal bial'iiman alsadiq biallah teala, w'ihsan aleamal aldhy yrdyh. waman yaemal eamalana syyana yujz bh, wala yajid lah siwaa allah taealaa wlyaan yatawalaa 'amrih wshanh, wala nsyrana ynsrh, wayadfae eanh su' aledhab
